Yihui Xie

About this guy

Yihui has a great passion for statistics, especially for statistical graphics. He thinks his IQ might be lower than the average level , because he is often confused by statistical theories and methods in classes. Not being able to follow those smart guys , every now and then he chooses to doze off in the back of the classroom or stand in the front to show others his animations (in order that he should not doze off again).

To know more about this guy, please visit his Blog or read his CV. Chinese visitors may also wish to visit his Chinese Blog.
